3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall height and thickness. Good isometric projection and clean roof removal. Minimal perspective distortion on far walls.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout generally follows the plan. Some slight proportional stretching in the living area compared to the floor plan. The Foyer entryway is simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Most furniture (beds, sofas, dining table) correctly placed. Bathroom fixtures are present. Kitchen cabinetry is simplified but correctly located.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render. No text contamination. Materials are consistent, though some wall textures (interior colors) vary from the neutral exterior.

detected_errors.description: The 'Utility' space and 'Deck' areas have merged or been slightly simplified compared to the precise architectural linework.
Window placements on the left-side wall are slightly offset from the 2D plan's technical markers.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately captures the layout and furniture arrangements of the original floor plan with strong geometric clarity.
